about.title: Building the Future of Insurance Together
about.paragraph1: UAN District is more than a workplace—it's a community of driven professionals committed to excellence, innovation, and making a meaningful impact in people's lives.
about.paragraph2: Since our founding, we've helped hundreds of advisors build thriving practices while maintaining the highest standards of integrity and client service.

career.title: Career Growth
career.description: Clear pathways for advancement with recognition programs and performance-based opportunities.

testimonials.quote1: Our team may not be large, but we are an MDRT district because we specialize in serving high-net-worth clients and providing group insurance. This focus enables higher commissions with a lighter workload.
testimonials.quote2: The training program provides a practical and systematic approach that helps agents pick up skills and follow market trends. The trainers are specialists in their respective areas. Therefore, I find the training highly practical and useful.
testimonials.quote3: Our district provides comprehensive training and support for agents. We also have a regional secretary to assist with administrative processing, management tasks, and inquiries. While delivering training, my goal is to offer a high degree of flexibility; therefore, our district does not require official working hours.

hero.title: Career Opportunities
hero.subtitle: Join our team and build a rewarding career in finance

advisor.title: Investment & Advisory Trainee
advisor.summary: Our client is a distinguished financial services firm dedicated to serving high-net-worth individuals with bespoke investment strategies and financial advisory services. Committed to excellence, we provide tailored wealth management solutions designed to preserve and grow our clients' assets across generations.
advisor.responsibilities: Engage with clients to understand their financial objectives and assist in crafting personalized investment strategies, Support investment advisors in monitoring analyzing and optimizing wealth portfolios, Conduct research on financial markets trends and opportunities to provide strategic recommendations, Work alongside legal tax and investment specialists to offer holistic wealth management services, Receive mentorship and hands-on training to develop expertise in private wealth advisory and financial strategies
advisor.requirements: A Bachelor's degree in any field. A degree in Finance Economics Accounting or a related field is a plus, Demonstrated analytical and problem-solving abilities with comfort working with data, Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills with a proven ability to collaborate effectively within a team, Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite with a particular emphasis on Excel and PowerPoint, Proficient in English Cantonese and Mandarin languages. Fluency in additional languages especially Asian languages is highly desirable
advisor.benefits: Work directly with high-net-worth clients in a prestigious financial services firm, Gain hands-on investment and portfolio management experience, Receive structured training and mentorship from financial industry experts, Clear career progression toward portfolio management and private wealth leadership, Salary of HKD 18000 to HKD 22000 per month

senior.title: Finance & Investment Trainee (Fresh Graduates Welcome)
senior.summary: We are seeking motivated and ambitious fresh graduates to join our Finance & Investment Trainee Program. This is an exciting opportunity to gain hands-on experience in corporate finance, investment banking, and wealth management. You will work alongside industry experts, develop critical skills, and contribute to high-impact projects in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
senior.responsibilities: Assist in financial modeling valuation and investment recommendations for clients, Conduct in-depth research on industry trends competitive landscapes and economic developments, Support senior advisors in building and maintaining client relationships, Prepare high-quality pitch decks reports and presentations for stakeholders, Contribute to strategic initiatives and identify new opportunities for growth
senior.requirements: A recently completed degree in Finance Economics Accounting or a related field, Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to interpret financial data, Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with a team-oriented mindset, A keen interest in financial markets investment strategies and wealth management, Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel PowerPoint Word), Proficient in English Cantonese and Mandarin languages. Fluency in additional languages especially Asian languages is highly desirable
senior.benefits: Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses, 5-day work week and a supportive collaborative work environment, Comprehensive training and mentorship from industry leaders, Fast-track career advancement opportunities in finance and investment, Medical benefits and study allowance for professional development, Exposure to high-net-worth clients and global financial markets, Salary range of HKD 18000 to HKD 22000 per month

manager.title: Senior Investment Advisor
manager.summary: Lead client portfolios and mentor junior advisors while developing sophisticated investment strategies for high-net-worth individuals.
manager.responsibilities: Manage and grow high-net-worth client portfolios with personalized investment strategies, Develop and implement sophisticated financial planning and wealth management solutions, Mentor and guide junior advisors and trainees in client consultation and portfolio management, Lead strategic client meetings and present investment recommendations to stakeholders, Collaborate with cross-functional teams including legal tax and investment specialists
manager.requirements: Minimum 3-5 years of experience in financial advisory wealth management or investment banking, Proven track record of managing client portfolios and achieving investment targets, Strong analytical skills with expertise in financial modeling valuation and market analysis, Excellent leadership and mentorship abilities with experience guiding junior team members, Professional certifications (CFA CFP or equivalent) are highly preferred, Fluency in English Cantonese and Mandarin
manager.benefits: Premium compensation package with performance-based incentives, Leadership development opportunities and career progression pathways, Access to high-net-worth client networks and exclusive investment opportunities, Comprehensive benefits including medical coverage professional development allowance, Collaborative work environment with industry-leading experts, International exposure and networking opportunities
